divs: Sighting Detailsi went outside to take out the trash and i looked up at the sky to see if there were any clouds or clear. i saw a very bright light in the southern sky over the trees.... stationary. i thought it was a star. but it was so bright. i ran inside and got my camera. when i took a picture of it it showed a round bright orb. then i zoomed my camera to the max and when i downloaded my card i had white squiggly lines instead of the orb. i lost sight of it when i went in to download my card, when i came back out it was gone. im not sure what this is but i have some photos that you might find interesting. these photos were taken tonite, my date and time was off by one day.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Athens
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: White sphere in the southern sky,
